Title: Relates to granting Onondaga community college campus peace officers, who are either former or current police officers, access to criminal history record information pursuant to 9 NYCRR 6051.1
Summary: Relates to granting Onondaga community college campus peace officers, who are either former or current police officers, access to criminal history record information pursuant to 9 NYCRR 6051.1.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to granting Onondaga community college campus peace officers access to criminal history record information pursuant to 9 NYCRR 6051.1
